articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK's Will to Cooperate in Verification of Objects of Nuclear Disablement
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on DPRK's Will to Cooperate in Verification of Objects of Nuclear Disablement
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Sunday as regards the U.S.'s delisting the DPRK as "a state sponsor of terrorism":
					 The DPRK-U.S. talks were held in Pyongyang from Oct. 1 to 3.
					
					 At the talks the two sides had an in-depth beneficial discussion on the issue of overcoming the obstacles and difficulties lying in the way of fulfilling the commitments to make political and economic compensation under the October 3 agreement and reached a series of agreements.
					
					 According to them, the U.S. administration took the final measure of writing the DPRK off the list of "state sponsors of terrorism" on Oct. 11.
					
					 We welcome the U.S. which has honored its commitment to delist the DPRK as "a state sponsor of terrorism" in the wake of ending the application of the Trading with the Enemy Act against the DPRK as it committed itself in the October 3 agreement.
					
					 As the U.S. fulfilled its commitment to make political compensation and a fair verification procedure in line with the phase of disablement was agreed upon between the DPRK and the U.S., the DPRK decided to resume the disablement of nuclear facilities in Nyongbyon and allow the inspectors of the U.S. and the IAEA to perform their duties on the principle of "action for action".
					
					 This means that the DPRK shall cooperate in the verification of objects of the disablement of nuclear facilities on the premise that the October 3 agreement will be fully implemented.
					
					 To round off the implementation of the October 3 agreement in the days ahead shall depend on whether the U.S. measure of delisting the DPRK as "a state sponsor of terrorism" actually takes effect and the other five parties complete their economic compensation.

articles.title: Message of Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Message of Greetings to President of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, President of Equatorial Guinea, on October 7 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of its independence.
					 The Korean people are pleased with the fact that the people of Equatorial Guinea have achieved many successes in their efforts to consolidate the national unity and political stability and build just and prosperous Equatorial Guinea under the correct leadership of the president, the message said.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Equatorial Guinea would continue to grow stronger, the message wished the president good health and success in his work.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages to Angolan PM and FM
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages to Angolan PM and FM
Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Antonio Paulo Kassoma upon his appointment as Prime Minister of Angola.
					 The message sincerely wished him great success in his noble work for consolidating the national reconciliation, unity and peace and achieving socio-economic development. 
					
					 Meanwhile, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, on the same day sent a similar message to Assuncao Afonso De Sousa Dos Anjos upon his appointment as foreign minister of Angola.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian FM
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Sunday sent a message of greetings to Russian foreign minister Sergei Viktorovich Lavrov on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia. 
					 He in the message said that the two countries as friendly neighbors have successfully cooperated with each other in the work to ensure the regional security and achieve the common prosperity of the peoples of the two countries over the past 60 years since the establishment of diplomatic ties. 
					
					 Expressing belief that the close cooperation between the Ministries of Foreign Affairs of the two countries would grow stronger in boosting the traditional DPRK-Russia relations of friendship and cooperation in the spirit of the common documents agreed upon between the two sides, the message wished him success in his responsible work for protecting the external interests of the country.

articles.title: Message of Greetings to Guinean FM
articles.content:
Message of Greetings to Guinean FM
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Guinean Foreign Minister Amadou Lamarana Bah on October 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Guinea.
					  He was pleased over the fact that the fraternal ties between the two countries and peoples have developed in all fields for the past half a century, he said.
					
					 He expressed belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in common interests and the relations of support and cooperation between the two ministries of foreign affairs would get closer.

articles.title: DPRK Religious Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
DPRK Religious Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Council of Religionists led by its Chairman Jang Jae On left here Saturday to participate in the 7th meeting of the Asian Conference of Religions for Peace to be held in Manila.

articles.title: Reception Arranged by DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs
articles.content:
Reception Arranged by DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs Saturday arranged a reception on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					 Present there on invitation were Mongolian Ambassador to the DPRK Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and officials concerned. 
					
					 Pak Ui Chun said at the reception that the DPRK and Mongolia have steadily boosted the bilateral relations in various fields including politics, economy and culture and closely supported and cooperated with each other in the international arena, too. 
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly Mongolian government and people would register greater success in their work to achieve the socio-political stability and unity of the country, develop economy and national culture and raise its international prestige.  
					
					 Sodovjamts Khurelbaatar in his speech expressed Mongolia's hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples on the principle of mutual understanding and trust in the future, too.
					
					 He wished the Korean people rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il bigger success in their drive for reunification and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Player Bags Gold Medal in World Go Contest
articles.content:
DPRK Player Bags Gold Medal in World Go Contest
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Jo Tae Won bagged a gold medal at the open individual go contest of the 1st World Intellect Championships opened in Beijing on October 3. 
					 The championships brought together at least 3,000 ace players from more than 140 countries and regions including the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Papers
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Papers today carried "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" published by leader Kim Jong Il, a discourse given to Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Minju Joson, the organ of the DPRK government, on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008).
					 The work said that the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung is the founder of the DPRK, father of socialist Korea and the eternal President of the State.
					
					 It noted that the 60 year-long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory, a history of creation and changes in which it has built a powerful and prosperous socialist nation under the guidance of the great leader and the great party. It emphasized that the DPRK has emerged a socialist power of Juche with invincible might as it is guided by the Juche idea and it has applied the idea to all fields of the nation-building and state activities. It underscored the need for the whole party and army and all people to energetically accelerate the all-out advance for the Songun revolution for building a great prosperous powerful nation with strong conviction of victory under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Russia Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Russia Observed
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia (Soviet Union at that time).
					 Leading newspapers today in signed articles dedicated to the anniversary say that Russia has steadily followed the path of progress despite turns and twists of history and has taken up a new appearance in the world today.
					
					 Expressing the belief of the Korean people that Russia's efforts to defend the dignity and security of the country and build a powerful state would certainly bear fruits, Rodong Sinmun goes on:
					
					 The DPRK and Russia are neighbors and their friendship has long-standing history and tradition.
					
					 Since the opening of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia 60 years ago the bilateral relations of friendship have steadily developed in line with the desire and interests of the two peoples. In this course, the two peoples have deepened friendship and mutual understanding.
					
					 In particular, a series of meetings between General Secretary Kim Jong Il and former President Putin and the adoption of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration and the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration in the new century marked very important occasions in putting the traditional DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations on a new high stage.
					
					 It is the common desire and wishes of the two peoples to steadily boost the DPRK-Russia friendship. The recent successful ground-breaking ceremony for the reconstruction of Rajin-Khasan Railways and Rajin Port is a manifestation of such desire and wishes.
					
					 The history of DPRK-Russia friendship will go on in the future, too.
					
					 Minju Joson notes that the Korean people are pleased with the successes made by Russia in its efforts to build a powerful state and ensure the security of the country.

articles.title: Multi-Polarization Is Irresistible Trend of Times
articles.content:
Multi-Polarization Is Irresistible Trend of Times
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The world is confidently heading for multi-polarization despite the U.S. ever-more undisguised moves to build a uni-polar world, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a signed article.
					 For the world to head for multi-polarization is an essential requirement for the human cause of independence and a basic trend of the present times, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 No country and nation wants a uni-polar world in which specified forces hold sway over in the international arena.
					
					 The conflicts and contradictions between the U.S. and other big powers have been brought into spotlight today. Russia has grown all the more defiant against the U.S., in particular.
					
					 The member states of the EU wish to integrate Europe and advance independently, as a polar freed from the U.S. control. The EU seeks to overwhelm the U.S. in the military and economic fields as an independent community and, therefore, it is rejecting and containing the U.S. keen to build a uni-polar world and wants to see a multi-polar world.
					
					 African countries are striving hard to achieve the progress and prosperity of the continent in unity, saying that the prospect of the development of the continent depends on the efforts of the Africans. Latin-American countries are taking a joint step in the struggle against the U.S. Latin America policy for aggression and interference in the internal affairs.
					
					 Regional organizations such as ASEAN which cooperated with each other mainly for economic purposes in the past are now working hard to strengthen unity and cooperation on a high level in the political and military fields. 
					
					 There are growing voices demanding the democratization of the UN so that some specified countries may not exercise privileged rights at the UN. 
					
					 The ever-growing trend towards the multi-polarization of the world is giving an impetus to the efforts to establish a new fair international order and carry out the cause of global independence and is, at the same time, precipitating the U.S. international isolation and destruction. The reality proves that nothing can stem the trend towards the multi-polarization of the world.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Bringing Its Nuclear Carrier to S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Bringing Its Nuclear Carrier to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The United States brought its nuclear carrier George Washington to Pusan Port on Oct. 6 under the pretext of participating in the so-called "naval review of the fleet."
					 The pretext invented by the U.S. this time was no more than a crafty artifice to cover up its scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK. Minju Joson Sunday says this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 George Washington is not a sightseeing ship but a super-large nuclear carrier, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The above-mentioned action taken by the U.S. is further escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula where the situation remains tense, getting on the nerves of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK. It is the reality on the peninsula that an accidental incident may spark off an armed conflict and develop into an all-out war. 
					
					 It is beyond doubt that the appearance of the above-said carrier at the port is an undisguised armed blackmail against the servicepersons and people in the DPRK. Herein lies the gravity of its action. 
					
					 As the reality proves, the aggressive nature of the U.S. remains unchanged. It is keen to ignite a war while watching for a chance to do so.  
					
					 This is the very reason why the army and people of the DPRK keep increasing the national capacity for self-defense while fastening their belts.
					
					 The people of the DPRK will boost the national capability for self-defense in every way under the uplifted banner of Songun in the future, too.
					
					 The U.S. had better drop its wild ambition to attack the DPRK by force.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Federal Formula for Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Federal Formula for Reunification
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- To achieve reunification by federal formula based on one nation, one state and two systems and two governments is the only shortcut to promoting reconciliation and unity between the north and the south, putting an end to the national division caused by outside forces and achieving the peaceful reunification of the country.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 Reunifying the country by federal formula means building a unified national state, leaving the differing ideologies and systems in the north and the south as they are, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung who regarded national reunification as the supreme task of the Korean nation from the very day of its division put forward the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo with deep penetration and clairvoyant wisdom and scientific insight into the essence and urgency of the solution to the issue of reunification and the reality of the country and worked heart and soul for its realization.
					
					 The federal formula is a way for reunification in full line with the Korean nation's desire for reunification and the realistic conditions of the country.
					
					 The homogenous Korean nation is quite capable of achieving reunification by the federal formula on the basis of tolerating the differing ideologies and systems in the north and the south. 
					
					 The federal formula is a fair and aboveboard way of achieving reunification as it does not pursue the superiority and interests of one side but promotes interests common to the nation.
					
					 When the country is reunified by the federal formula, it will be possible for the Koreans to establish sovereignty throughout Korea and achieve the great unity as one and same nation and Korea will emerge a unified national state, independent, peaceful and neutral. The unified federal state will neither infringe upon the interests of the neighboring countries nor pose any threat to those countries.
					
					 The north and the south of Korea recognized in the historic June 15 joint declaration that there is a community in the north-proposed low-level federation and the south side's proposal for confederation and solemnly declared at home and abroad that they would work for reunification in this direction. Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea is, however, seeking the "unification of systems," not the peaceful reunification of the north and the south, denying the June 15 joint declaration supported and hailed by all Koreans. This is intolerable as it is a criminal act of inciting confrontation between the north and the south and bringing a war of aggression against the north, brushing aside the proposal for achieving reunification by federal formula, a realistic way of achieving national independence and reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Army Authorities' Humiliating Agreement Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Army Authorities' Humiliating Agreement Assailed
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 8 at which it denounced the puppet army authorities for making a humiliating agreement to take over waste ammunition of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					 Speakers at the press conference recalled that shortly ago the puppet Ministry of National Defense agreed with the U.S. to take over 259,000 tons of unused ammunition of the U.S. forces in south Korea, branding it as another "drain on resources for the U.S. forces" in the wake of the negotiations with it on import of American beef.
					
					 A press release was read out then. It noted that the said ammunition has already lost its efficiency because the term of its use expired more than 20 years ago, terming the puppet army authorities' decision to take over ammunition not worth scrap iron under the pretext of "alliance" slavish submission to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea accumulated illicit money by using the fund for the upkeep of the forces for the transfer of their bases in south Korea, but the army authorities let loose sophism that "they do not deem it a violation," the release deplored, urging the minister of "National Defense" to resign at once as he is keen on meeting the U.S. interests.
					
					 The release demanded the "government" and the "National Assembly" directly intervene in this matter to thoroughly probe the truth behind the case and punish the one responsible for it.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Distortion of History Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Distortion of History Flailed
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of different social strata are waging a struggle against the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to distort history.
					 More than 20 organizations related to the history called a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 8 at which they issued a joint statement denouncing the Lee group for its farce intended to rewrite history textbooks.
					
					 The statement accused the group of calling for the overall rewriting of history textbooks, claiming that "they are written to meet the leftist purpose."
					
					 It denounced the "government" for raising even the issue of "changing the authority" to rewrite history textbooks as demanded by conservative organizations which have nothing to do with the history circle.
					
					 Such moves of the Lee group to tamper with history are aimed to justify pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese acts and the fascist dictatorship in the past, held the statement.
					
					 In the meantime, organizations related to history and education of south Korea including the Institute for National Studies, the Institute for History Studies, the National Teachers Union and the Society of Parents for Genuine Education have launched a full-dressed struggle after organizing a preparatory committee for the formation of the Joint Measure Committee for the Settlement of the Issue of Textbooks.

articles.title: U.S. Shameless Act Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Shameless Act Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- More than 40 political parties and civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Democratic Labor Party and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification called a press conference outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Oct. 7 at which they denounced the U.S. shameless act.
					 Speakers at the press conference assailed the U.S. for having illegally used the premises of the U.S. embassy, etc. in Seoul for several decades without paying a single penny.
					
					 The U.S. has used the area of the U.S. embassy and its premises, etc.   in Seoul without paying any rent since 1980, too, when the shackling "memorandum of understanding" that allowed the U.S. to use the embassy building free of charge lost its validity, they held, adding that the rent it has not paid to south Korea since then amounts to more than 250 billion won.
					
					 They declared that they would take a strong legal action to wrest apology from the U.S. for illegally using the area of the U.S. embassy and punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Repressive Action Blasted
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Repressive Action Blasted
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- "The Association of Those Arrested for Participating in Candlelight Actions," an internet organization in south Korea, held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 7 to accuse the puppet prosecution of taking a repressive action against participants in the candlelight struggle. 
					 Speakers at the conference recalled that the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office on Oct. 2 referred to a court at least 90 persons among those who were illegally arrested and prosecuted for their involvement in candlelight actions and imposed upon them a fine up to 3 million won. 
					
					 They held that the Lee Myung Bak group's action to punish on charges of being "violent demonstrators" those citizens who participated in peaceful rallies with candlelight in protest against the unpopular policy of the "government" clearly showed what extent its moves to revive the fascist dictatorship reached. 
					
					 They urged the "government" not to suppress the participants in the above-said rallies on charges of violation of the "law on assembly and demonstration" but punish the police who mercilessly suppressed them, threatening citizens and firing water cannons against them at random. 
					
					 At the end of the conference the members of the organization launched a "movement for boycotting the payment of the fine."

articles.title: Intelligence Service's Smear Campaign Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Intelligence Service's Smear Campaign Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Emergency Measure Committee for frustrating the retaliatory crackdown upon participants in candlelight actions, moves for scrapping the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and a plot to fake up a case for suppressing the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Intelligence Service on Oct. 7 in denunciation of the authorities' vicious smear campaign.
					  A press release was read out at the conference. It charged that far from reflecting on his wrongs before the candlelight of anger raised by millions of people, Lee Myung Bak is carrying out reprisal on the people involved in the candlelight actions and obstructing the reunification movement by dint of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The Intelligence Service acts as the chief executor of such dictatorial policy of the Lee Myung Bak "government", the release said, and went on:
					
					 On September 27 the IS searched offices of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in Seoul and other 27 areas and the June 15 TV, the June 15 Press and other institutions run by the solidarity without warrants and confiscated documents from them.
					
					 It has also got hell-bent on such smear campaign as fabricating official documents while asking the court for warrants of arrest for core members of the solidarity.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration should be implemented to the letter to achieve the national reunification at an early date, the release said, demanding that the IS stop illegal violence against human rights and dismantle itself at once and discontinue the smear campaign against the solidarity.

articles.title: Stop to Unjust Suppression of Media Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Unjust Suppression of Media Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) issued a statement on Oct. 7 to protest against the "Yonhap TV News" side's unjust suppression of members of the Press Trade Union.
					 The statement disclosed the fact that the side took such disciplinary measures as lay-off against 33 members of the union including the chief of its "News" branch who had struggled to defend public broadcasting and freedom of the press.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" is getting evermore clumsy and ferocious in the moves to control the "News", it pointed out, branding the said measures as an outrageous deed of the side upset by the intensified struggle of unionists.
					
					 The statement urged the side to stop the suppression of unionists and revoke the disciplinary measures immediately and declared that the KCTU, together with all the people, would fight against the Lee Myung Bak regime's scheme to put media under its control.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean News Service Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean News Service Marked
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean News Service of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) was held in Tokyo on Oct. 10.
					 Present there were officials of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon including Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and those in local areas, officials, advisers, journalists and editors of the Korean News Service and other officials in the field of media.
					
					 Introduced there were congratulatory messages sent by the Korean Central News Agency and Chongryon organizations at all levels on the occasion of the anniversary.
					
					 Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, in his congratulatory speech said that it is entirely thanks to the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the particularly warm fatherly care shown by them that the Korean News Service has proudly covered a patriotic path, sharing its destiny with the homeland despite the Japanese reactionaries' vicious anti-DPRK moves and brutal suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 Yang In Won, director general of the service, in a report declared that all officials of the service would make all efforts to develop the media activities as intended and desired by Kim Jong Il, deeply cherishing the unshakable faith that they will certainly emerge victors as long as they are led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted there.
					
					 A reception was given on the same day to celebrate the anniversary.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting, a lecture, a seminar, a news briefing, photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Mexico, Cambodia and Iran on Oct. 3 and 4 on the occasions of the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Put on display in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great men, photos showing the feats performed by them in leading the party construction and books and photos introducing successes the Korean people have made in socialist construction under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, in a speech made at a meeting said that the WPK has covered a shining road as an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people for the past more than six decades under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, in a lecture referred in detail to the validity and vitality of the Juche idea and Songun idea, the true picture of Songun Korea where all its people are singly-mindedly united and the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in strengthening the WPK.
					
					 Lu Lay Sreng, first vice-chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, in his speech said that the great feats performed by Kim Il Sung on behalf of the homeland and the nation by liberating the country from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and founding the invincible WPK and the DPRK would shine long.
					
					 The secretary general of the International Taekwon-Do Association in Iran in a news briefing praised the WPK as an experienced and seasoned party, an ever-victorious and invincible party founded by President Kim Il Sung and led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Participants of the film shows appreciated a Korean film showing the invincible might of the WPK.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Pretoria branch of the Democratic Teachers Union of South Africa who is also chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa issued a statement on Oct. 3 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said that the October 4 declaration which was adopted thanks to the noble patriotic intention of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has rendered devoted services for the country's reunification serves as a banner encouraging the Koreans in their efforts for independent development and reunification and a programme for fully implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Korea should be reunified by the concerted efforts of the Koreans under any circumstances, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 The Korean Peninsula still remains divided because the present south Korean regime keeps pursuing the policy of inciting confrontation with the north and begs the U.S. to remain in south Korea permanently while entirely depending on it.
					
					 Recently the south Korean regime staged large-scale war exercises in collusion with the U.S., pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 If the south Korean regime truly respects the October 4 declaration and stands for reunification it should stop pursuing the policy of inciting confrontation with the north and that of depending on outsiders but make a policy switchover as early as possible in the direction of finding out a way for reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: Bulletin Published by Mexican Institute for Study of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Bulletin Published by Mexican Institute for Study of Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea published bulletin No. 26 titled "The fundamental principle for the solution of the issue of Korea's reunification" carrying photographs showing the revolutionary activities of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasions of the 28th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the first anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The bulletin said in an article that the United States has persistently obstructed the reunification after dividing Korea into two parts with a wild ambition to dominate Asia and other parts of the world by using the Korean Peninsula as a springboard.
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification is, in essence, the matter of retaking half of its territory from the domination of foreign forces and establishing the sovereignty of the nation throughout Korea, the bulletin noted, and went on:
					
					 For the Korean nation reunification means national independence and vice versa.
					
					 It was by no means fortuitous that "By our nation itself," the idea of national independence, was projected at the inter-Korean summit held in June 2000.
					
					 The reunification of Korea is sure to be achieved when different political parties, organizations and people of all strata in the north and the south firmly unite, giving priority to the nation's great idea of achieving reunification irrespective of idea and ism and partisan interests and strategy and all Koreans respect and sincerely implement the idea of "By our nation itself".
					
					 The bulletin called on the international community to reject foreign interference in the issue of Korea's reunification and obstructions to its solution and support the Korean people in the struggle to achieve without fail the reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of national independence.

articles.title: First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in Ukraine
articles.content:
First Anniversary of October 4 Declaration Marked in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine held a meeting in Kiev on Oct. 3 on the occasion of the first anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 Present there were members of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine and the Association of Koreans in Kiev.
					
					Speeches were made after a report by Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine.
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed that the October 4 declaration adopted thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il's patriotic will for reunification and great and courageous decision is a great programme for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself" and a programme for comprehensively implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The October 4 declaration serves as a banner encouraging the overseas compatriots to achieve the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, they noted.
					
					 Recalling that the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration ushered in a new era of reconciliation, cooperation and reunification, they strongly condemned the Lee Myung Bak regime for becoming evermore undisguised in its moves against reunification and the nation quite contrary to the era.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the above-said declarations are strikingly demonstrated day by day, they said, calling on the overseas compatriots to intensify the reunification movement in order to cope with the racket of confrontation with the DPRK being kicked up in south Korea.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Observed in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a seminar took place in Nepal, a meeting in Italy and a seminar in Mongolia on Oct. 3 and 4 on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of the peerlessly great men, photographs showing immortal feats performed in leading the party construction, books and photographs introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 C.P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that the birthday of the WPK is, indeed, a significant and glorious day for the political parties and people of Nepal.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung is a great party with a more than half a century-long history, a wealth of experience in struggle and traditions shining with victory, adding that many progressive political parties and people of the world are earnestly learning from the experience of the WPK.
					
					 Michele Capuano, director of the Public Relations Department of the Razio Branch of the Communist Party of Italy, hoped that victory would always be in store for the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, defend the socialist cause and achieve the country's reunification. 
					
					 D. Bilegt, general secretary of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia, and Ch. Surenjav, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society, stressed that this year marks the 20th anniversary of Kim Il Sung's visit to Mongolia, the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries and the 63rd anniversary of the founding of the WPK, noting that the WPK has covered a road of victory and glory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Nepal and Mongolia.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona compania femenina de Unidad No. 821 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona compania femenina de Unidad No. 821 de EPC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la compania artillera femenina adscrita a la Unidad No. 821 del EPC.
					  Tras averiguar como cumple su mision esta compania, el Comandante Supremo presencio un ejercicio del manejo de canones de las militares. 
					
					  Se mostro satisfecho de que ellas cumplen con responsabilidad y alta vigilancia la guardia avanzada frente a las cada dia mas recrudescentes maniobras agresivas de los enemigos y se forman como guerreras capaces de una contra cien enemigos, e indico las tareas que se presentan para el fortalecimiento de la combatividad de la compania. 
					
					  Al mirar los arboles frondosos de distintas especies paseando en el recinto del cuartel, dijo que la compania realizo bien la reforestacion y aprecio a las militares que cuidan esmeradamente cada arbol y cada hierba de la patria dando pruebas de su ardiente patriotismo. 
					
					  Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo recorrio la sala de educacion, el dormitorio, el comedor, el bano, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios y otros lugares cerciorandose en detalles de la labor y vida de las militares. 
					
					   Muy contento de que las uniformadas viven con el impetu revolucionario y combativo segun la demanda de la consigna de "!El ejercicio, el estudio y la vida a la manera de la guerrilla antijaponesa!", y en particular, logran muchos exitos en el cultivo de autoconsumo, evaluo altamente el hacendoso modo de vida economica de ellas. 
					
					  Dijo que las militares, que tomaron los puestos de defensa de la patria con el fusil en la mano, son tesoros del pais y recomendo a los comandantes de la unidad que presten especial atencion a la vida de ellas.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto a las militares de la compania.
					
					  Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: El MINREX declara la colaboracion con la verificacion sobre Nyongbyon
articles.content:
El MINREX declara la colaboracion con la verificacion sobre Nyongbyon
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que EE.UU. elimino Corea de la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo" el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) respondio el dia 12 como sigue:
					  Tuvieron lugar del primero al 3 del mes en curso en esta capital las conversaciones entre la RPDC y los Estados Unidos.
					
					  En esta ocasion se realizo la discusion sincera y util para superar los obstaculos y dificultades presentados en el proceso de la ejecucion de los deberes de compensacion politica y economica segun el Acuerdo del 3 de Octubre y se logro una serie de acuerdos.
					
					  Segun este resultado, la administracion norteamericana tomo el 11 de octubre la medida final de excluir a la RPDC de la lista de los "paises que apoyan el terrorismo".
					
					  Aplaudimos esta medida de EE.UU. tomada despues de poner fin a la aplicacion de la ley de comercio exterior con los paises enemigos contra nuestro pais, segun lo prometido en el Acuerdo del 3 de Octubre.
					
					  EE.UU. llevo a cabo la ejecucion de la obligacion de la indemnizacion politica y ambas partes de Corea y EE.UU. acordaron el procedimiento de la verificacion justa conveniente a la etapa de la neutralizacion. 
					
					  Por eso, tambien la RPDC, adhiriendose al principio de "accion vs. accion", decidio reiniciar la neutralizacion de las instalaciones nucleares de Nyongbyon y volver a permitir el cumplimiento del deber de los inspectores de EE.UU. y la Agencia Internacional de Energia Atomica.
					
					  Esto significa que la RPDC colabora con la verificacion sobre los objetos de la neutralizacion de las instalaciones nucleares tomando por premisa la ejecucion completa del Acuerdo del 3 de Octubre.
					
					  El problema de que en el futuro se finalizara por completo la ejecucion de ese acuerdo depende de la vigencia real de esa medida de EE.UU. y la culminacion de la indemnizacion economica por 5 partes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere al proyecto de fundacion de la RFDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere al proyecto de fundacion de la RFDC
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- La formula del sistema federativo sobre la base de una nacion y un Estado, dos regimenes y dos gobiernos deviene la via para lograr la reconciliacion y la unidad entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y realizar con mas rapidez y por via pacifica la reunificacion de la patria poniendo fin a la division impuesta por las fuerzas foraneas.
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 11 y continua:
					
					  La formula del sistema federal significa instituir un Estado unificado nacional dejando intactos diferentes ideas y regimenes existentes en el Norte y el Sur.
					
					  Desde el tiempo inicial de la division del pais el Presidente Kim Il Sung presento la reunificacion del pais como tarea suprema de la nacion.
					
					  Luego de percatarse de la esencia y la urgencia de la solucion del problema de reunificacion y la realidad del pais, presento con la genial presciencia y penetracion cientifica el proyecto de fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo e hizo  todos  los esfuerzos abnegados por llevarla a efecto.
					
					  El sistema federativo es el medio de reunificacion que conviene enteramente a la aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la reintegracion y las condiciones reales creadas en el pais.
					
					  La nacion coreana homogenea puede reintegrarse por la formula del sistema federal sobre la base de la tolerancia mutua de las ideas y regimenes existentes en ambas partes.
					
					  Este sistema deviene la justa via de la reunificacion que no da ventaja e intereses a una parte sino promueve los intereses comunes de la nacion entera.
					
					  De lograrse la reunificacion por este sistema, la nacion coreana podra establecer la soberania en la esfera pannacional y lograr la gran unidad nacional y Corea sera el Estado reunificado nacional independiente, pacifico y neutral.
					
					  Este Estado federal no atentara los intereses de los paises perifericos ni dara amenaza a estos.
					
					  En la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio el Norte y el Sur, al reconocer la existencia del punto comun entre la proposicion federativa de la etapa inferior de la parte Norte y la propuesta de la union de la parte Sur y dio a conocer solemnemente al pais y extranjero lo acordado de seguir laborando para lograr la reunificacion en esta direccion.
					
					  Pero, el  traidor Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea, al negar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio que aclama toda la nacion, busca lograr la "unificacion del sistema" en vez de la reunificacion pacifica del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  No puede tolerarse jamas este acto criminal que niega el sistema federativo que es el medio realista de la reunificacion independiente de la nacion y acarrea la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur y la  guerra de agresion al primero.

articles.title: Actos en varios paises por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Actos en varios paises por efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 11 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 63o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea tuvieron lugar los dias 3 y 4 mitin y semanario en Nepal, un acto en Italia y simposio en Mongolia.
					En los lugares de actos estaban exhibidos las obras de los Grandes Hombres sin pares (el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il), las fotos alusivas a sus inmortales hazanas de la direccion  realizadas en la construccion del partido, los libros y fotos que dan a conocer la Corea del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					En las ocasiones hubo los discursos.
					
					El secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Comunista Nepales (Marxista-Leninista), C. P. Mainali, dijo que el dia conmemorativo de la fundacion del PTC es el dia significativo y jubiloso para los partidos politicos y el pueblo de Nepal.
					
					El prosiguio que el PTC fundado por el Presidente Kim Il Sung es el gran partido que tiene la historia de mas de medio siglo, abundantes experiencias de lucha y la tradicion de la brillante victoria y subrayo que numerosos partidos politicos y pueblos progresistas del mundo aprenden activamente las experiencias del PTC.
					
					El director del departamento de los asuntos exteriores de la sucursal de Razio del Partido Comunista de Italia, Michele Capuano, deseo al PTC y el pueblo coreano siempre la victoria en su lucha por preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, defender la causa socialista y reunificar el pais.
					
					El secretario general de la Federacion de Organizaciones de la Paz y Amistad de Mongolia, D. Bilegt, y el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Mongolia-Corea, Ch. Surenjav, subrayaron que en este ano se celebraran el 20o aniversario de la visita del Presidente Kim Il Sung a Mongolia, el 60o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises y el 63o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y elogiaron que bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il el PTC recorre por el camino de victoria y gloria.
					
					En los actos celebrados en Nepal y Mongolia fueron aprobados los mensajes de felicitacion al Dirigente.
